text:
Geoblink |Data Scientist & Data Engineer| Madrid | Remote or Onsite | 45.000€ to 55.000€

We are a series A startup dedicated to change the face of Location Intelligence and how business use and think about data! We are looking for Engineers who are passionate about databases, Big Data and ETLs and Scientists who are passionate about finding, processing and modelling data to solve real world problems...as everyone else is!

Working with us means that you would be one of the main points of reference to, given a product requirement, figure out how to obtain the different types of data that will make it possible, and transform them into meaningful insights so that they can be consumed by the back end systems that fuel our multi-country solution.

If you're interested in applying or finding out more check out our career page: https://www.geoblink.com/work-with-us/

ʕノ•ᴥ•ʔノ Join us!
